about.title: About me
about.description: Full Stack Developer with experience in e-commerce and web applications. I work with agile methodologies (Scrum/Kanban), focusing on security, clear communication, and teamwork.

duties: Development and maintenance of solutions using blockchain technologies.
Participation in agile sprints and integration with corporate systems.
Use of languages, frameworks, and tools for distributed and secure applications.
Interface and component development using Vue.js.
Implementation of responsive design and integration with APIs.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Some works and studies that reflect my focus on quality, performance, and best practices.

medicalService.description: Service order management system developed with React (front-end) and Node.js + MongoDB (back-end). Allows creating, managing, and signing service orders digitally through a signature resource with canvas, in addition to exporting them as PDF. The interface is fully responsive, ensuring a smooth experience on any device, with intuitive navigation and efficient workflow.

blogAPI.description: API RESTful for blog with authentication and relationships.

trybeSmithAPI.description: API for a medieval shop with authentication and product CRUD.

RegistraEmpregadoAPI.description: Simple API for employee registration and management by department, developed as an academic project. Allows for adding, listing, updating, and removing employees, associating them with different departments. The focus was on applying back-end development concepts, best practices in code organization, and structured data consumption.

recipesApp.description: Recipe application developed with React and Context API, allowing for searching, creating, and sharing recipes.

FacilitaServico.description: Facilita Serviços is a web platform developed with Quasar Framework to connect clients and self-employed professionals from various fields, facilitating service hiring, scheduling, profile management, and chat communication.

hero.title: Hello, I'm Felipe Vergara Chico
hero.description: Full Stack Developer | Node.js, React, TypeScript, SQL, C#, ASP.NET, Docker, Linux
